content.p: Corporate Marketing offers corporate gift as a means to enhance the University's corporate image and to generate goodwill. This kind gesture helps in building and maintaining good client relationships. As limited quantities of corporate gifts are available at Corporate Marketing for emergency purposes, each department is encouraged to keep their own stock for internal use to avoid disappointment for urgent requests. If you would like to receive updates on the options and availability of corporate gifts, please contact us at Corporate Marketing. To request a corporate gift. See the type of corporate gifts available before you request for one. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
